Title: Directs utilities to study the potential health risks and effects of smart meters
Summary: Directs utilities to study the potential health risks and effects of smart meters including, but not limited to, the risks and effects of the installation of such smart meters, and recommended safe practices associated with the use of smart meters; requires utilities to report their findings to the public service commission; requires the public service commission to prepare a comprehensive report to the governor and legislature.
ActClause: AN ACT directing utilities to study the potential health risks and effects of smart meters; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
